prompt.task: Generate AstroJs website to host markdown documentation

requirements.packaging: Package as an OCI container using Podman
requirements.search: Include the necessary plugins to index the content and provide a search box
requirements.mermaidjs: Include the Mermaid.js library to support diagram rendering
requirements.automation: Generate a GitHub Action to package the pod as an OCI container
Generate the dependabot configuration file for node packages and github actions in the .github directory
Upload the OCI container to the GitHub Container Registry
requirements.documentation: Generate a README.md file that describes how to get started with developing.

content.description: The content added to the website will be used to support several applications. The design of the site is intended to standardize how our team documents runbooks, support, and development documentation.
